ETHICAL NOSTALGIA SOURCING

NostalgiaVent is committed to the responsible procurement of all vintage sensory materials. No cultural trauma is knowingly exploited. All Foley recordings are made with the informed consent of property owners, ambient bystanders, and — where applicable — the buildings themselves (structural vibration waivers, Form NV-88b).

Our scent chemists operate under strict ethical guidelines established by the International Olfactory Preservation Board (founded 2021, dissolved 2023, currently under investigation). All atmospheric reconstructions are verified against primary sources and cross-referenced with at least two living witnesses over the age of 55.

We do not source from active war zones, sites of ecological disaster, or the 1980s (pending further review).
